description: The Capital Expenditure Budgeting Program Manager is responsible for creating and maintaining the overall project budget and generation of a capitalization plan based on project schedules The CapEx Budgeting PM will work with various cross-functional teams to collect information to create the budget and understand the technical changes that impact the budget. • The ideal candidate would be able to gather and analyze large amounts of data at a macro and micro level. • Work with Engineering, Operations and Finance to draft and submit capital equipment budgets. • Track and analyze spend against budgets • Provide inputs to financial forecasts • Work with cross-functional teams to review, change and develop process to improve efficiencies of CapEx spend • Contribute in process re-engineering including development of a new system • Interact with all levels (from analyst to Executive VPs) and departments (such as Finance and Procurement)
key_qualifications: Comfortable working with large number sets and ability to run analytical reports; Experience in manufacturing or engineering is preferred; Proficient in finance; Impeccable organizational, multi-tasking and management skills; Excellent communication skills, both verbally and written; Willingness and ability to travel internationally up to 1-2 times a year
